mapper.select: select * from i_information where 1=1 and iadress=#{adress}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO i_information (IID, IContent, IImage, IAdress, IDate, IStatus, IInformation1, IInformation2, IInformation3) select CONCAT('i',(max(SUBSTR(iid,2))+1)),#{IContent},#{IImage},#{IAdress},#{IDate}, #{IStatus},null,null,null from i_information
